Perfectprospect tool
The Perfectprospect chrome extension enables users to be able to log into their accounts. Perfectprospect is a LinkedIn Automation tool that enables sales managers, marketers and agencies to automate their outbound prospecting efforts. If you're looking to generate 2X more meetings then this is the tool for you.

Some functionalities:

1. Log into your account
2. Create complex sequences (email & linkedin messages)
3. Automate your follow ups

And much more!
